channel.title: Private chat disconected me when pm
channel.description:
On my server, xlinescape, every time i get pmed i get disconected and i get this error [code]Error: T1 - 154,0 - 200,126[/code] on the bottom of mopar... Happens to everyone! How do i fix it?
it look like the bug is with in the client.java

item.title: Private chat disconected me when pm
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

XmoparscapeX:

ok bluurr i use xlinescape 2.7 and ive coded it but… when people pm me i did get that and the it faded away so i told people not to chat on pm maby its a falt in the server

it something i added but i cant be sure what cause it a long time ago i am checking the server out and will hope to fix it

Read full topic
